text: Practice Problem 4.1 (solution page 516) Determine the byte encoding of the Y86-64 instruction sequence that follows. The line .pos 0x100 indicates that the starting address of the object code should be 0x100. .pos 0x100 # Start code at address 0x100 irmovq $15,%rbx rrmovq %rbx,%rcx loop: rmmovq %rcx,-3(%rbx) addq â€” %rbx,%rcx jmp loop
